1: אֵ֠לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <sup>2706 </sup> <n>These [are] the statutes</n> וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֮ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and judgments</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּשְׁמְר֣וּן <sup>8104 </sup> <n>which ye shall observe</n> לַעֲשׂוֹת֒ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to do</n> בָּאָ֕רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נָתַ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֧י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> אֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of thy fathers</n> לְךָ֖ לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>thee to possess</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַיָּמִ֔ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>it all the days</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אַתֶּ֥ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> חַיִּ֖ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>that ye live</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <sup>127 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n>
2: אַבֵּ֣ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>Ye shall utterly</n> תְּ֠אַבְּדוּן <sup>6 </sup> <n>destroy</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַמְּקֹמ֞וֹת <sup>4725 </sup> <n>all the places</n> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָֽבְדוּ־ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>served</n> שָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>wherein the nations</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> אַתֶּ֛ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> יֹרְשִׁ֥ים <sup>3423 </sup> <n>ye shall possess</n> אֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their gods</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הֶהָרִ֤ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>mountains</n> הָֽרָמִים֙ <sup>7311 </sup> <n>upon the high</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and on</n> הַגְּבָע֔וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and upon the hills</n> וְתַ֖חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and under</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> עֵ֥ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>tree</n> רַעֲנָן׃ <sup>7488 </sup> <n>and under every green</n>
3: וְנִתַּצְתֶּ֣ם <sup>5422 </sup> <n>And ye shall overthrow</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִזְבּחֹתָ֗ם <sup>4196 </sup> <n>their altars</n> וְשִׁבַּרְתֶּם֙ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>and break</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַצֵּ֣בֹתָ֔ם <sup>4676 </sup> <n>their pillars</n> וַאֲשֵֽׁרֵיהֶם֙ <sup>842 </sup> <n>their groves</n> תִּשְׂרְפ֣וּן <sup>8313 </sup> <n>and burn</n> בָּאֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n> וּפְסִילֵ֥י <sup>6456 </sup> <n>the graven images</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>of their gods</n> תְּגַדֵּע֑וּן <sup>1438 </sup> <n>and ye shall hew down</n> וְאִבַּדְתֶּ֣ם <sup>6 </sup> <n>and destroy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמָ֔ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the names</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>that</n> הַמָּק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of them out of that place</n> הַהֽוּא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n>
4: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תַעֲשׂ֣וּן <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Ye shall not do so</n> כֵּ֔ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>like</n> לַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n>
5: כִּ֠י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִֽם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמָּק֞וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>But unto the place</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִבְחַ֨ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>shall choose</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>7626 </sup> <n>out of all your tribes</n> לָשׂ֥וּם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>to put</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> שָׁ֑ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> לְשִׁכְנ֥וֹ <sup>7933 </sup> <n>there [even] unto his habitation</n> תִדְרְשׁ֖וּ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>shall ye seek</n> וּבָ֥אתָ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and thither thou shalt come</n> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n>
6: וַהֲבֵאתֶ֣ם <sup>935 </sup> <n>And thither ye shall bring</n> שָׁ֗מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> עֹלֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>your burnt offerings</n> וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>2077 </sup> <n>and your sacrifices</n> וְאֵת֙ <sup>853 </sup> מַעְשְׂרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>4643 </sup> <n>and your tithes</n> וְאֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <sup>8641 </sup> <n>and heave offerings</n> יֶדְכֶ֑ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of your hand</n> וְנִדְרֵיכֶם֙ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>and your vows</n> וְנִדְבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>5071 </sup> <n>and your freewill offerings</n> וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <sup>1062 </sup> <n>and the firstlings</n> בְּקַרְכֶ֖ם <sup>1241 </sup> <n>of your herds</n> וְצֹאנְכֶֽם׃ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>and of your flocks</n>
7: וַאֲכַלְתֶּם־ <sup>398 </sup> <n>And there ye shall eat</n> שָׁ֗ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> לִפְנֵי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <sup>8055 </sup> <n>and ye shall rejoice</n> בְּכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִשְׁלַ֣ח <sup>4916 </sup> <n>in all that ye put</n> יֶדְכֶ֔ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>your hand</n> אַתֶּ֖ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וּבָתֵּיכֶ֑ם <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto ye and your households</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בֵּֽרַכְךָ֖ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>hath blessed</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>wherein the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n>
8: לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תַעֲשׂ֔וּן <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Ye shall not do</n> כְּ֠כֹל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> אֲנַ֧חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> עֹשִׂ֛ים <sup>6213 </sup> <n>after all [the things] that we do</n> פֹּ֖ה <sup>6311 </sup> <n>here</n> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>here this day</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>whatever</n> הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>whatsoever [is] right</n> בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in his own eyes</n>
9: כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> בָּאתֶ֖ם <sup>935 </sup> <n>For ye are not as yet come</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>as</n> עָ֑תָּה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>yet</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמְּנוּחָה֙ <sup>4496 </sup> <n>to the rest</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> הַֽנַּחֲלָ֔ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>and to the inheritance</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> נֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לָֽךְ׃
10: וַעֲבַרְתֶּם֮ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>But [when] ye go over</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <sup>3383 </sup> <n>Jordan</n> וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֣ם <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and dwell</n> בָּאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> מַנְחִ֣יל <sup>5157 </sup> <n>giveth you to inherit</n> אֶתְכֶ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> וְהֵנִ֨יחַ <sup>5117 </sup> <n>and [when] he giveth you rest</n> לָכֶ֧ם מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>from all your enemies</n> מִסָּבִ֖יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> וִֽישַׁבְתֶּם־ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>so that ye dwell</n> בֶּֽטַח׃ <sup>983 </sup> <n>in safety</n>
11: וְהָיָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall come</n> הַמָּק֗וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>Then there shall be a place</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִבְחַר֩ <sup>977 </sup> <n>shall choose</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֥ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> בּוֹ֙ לְשַׁכֵּ֤ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>to dwell</n> שְׁמוֹ֙ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>to cause his name</n> שָׁ֔ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> שָׁ֣מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> תָבִ֔יאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>there thither shall ye bring</n> אֵ֛ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוֶּ֣ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>all that I command</n> אֶתְכֶ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> עוֹלֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <sup>5930 </sup> <n>you your burnt offerings</n> וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>2077 </sup> <n>and your sacrifices</n> מַעְשְׂרֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <sup>4643 </sup> <n>your tithes</n> וּתְרֻמַ֣ת <sup>8641 </sup> <n>and the heave offering</n> יֶדְכֶ֔ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of your hand</n> וְכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> מִבְחַ֣ר <sup>4005 </sup> <n>and all your choice</n> נִדְרֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>5088 </sup> <n>vows</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּדְּר֖וּ <sup>5087 </sup> <n>which ye vow</n> לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n>
12: וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <sup>8055 </sup> <n>And ye shall rejoice</n> לִפְנֵי֮ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֒ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> אַתֶּ֗ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>ye and your sons</n> וּבְנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and your daughters</n> וְעַבְדֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>5650 </sup> <n>and your menservants</n> וְאַמְהֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>519 </sup> <n>and your maidservants</n> וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <sup>3881 </sup> <n>and the Levite</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בְּשַֽׁעֲרֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>8179 </sup> <n>that [is] within your gates</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>forasmuch</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>has</n> ל֛וֹ חֵ֥לֶק <sup>2506 </sup> <n>as he hath no part</n> וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>nor inheritance</n> אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>
13: הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Take heed</n> לְךָ֔ פֶּֽן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּעֲלֶ֖ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>to thyself that thou offer</n> עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>not thy burnt offerings</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> מָק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>in every place</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>that thou seest</n>
14: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>but</n> בַּמָּק֞וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>But in the place</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִבְחַ֤ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>shall choose</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> בְּאַחַ֣ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>in one</n> שְׁבָטֶ֔יךָ <sup>7626 </sup> <n>of thy tribes</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> תַּעֲלֶ֣ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>there thou shalt offer</n> עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>thy burnt offerings</n> וְשָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and there thou shalt do</n> כֹּ֛ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוֶּֽךָּ׃ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>all that I command</n>
15: רַק֩ <sup>7535 </sup> <n>within</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> אַוַּ֨ת <sup>185 </sup> <n>lusteth after</n> נַפְשְׁךָ֜ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>whatsoever thy soul</n> תִּזְבַּ֣ח ׀ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>Notwithstanding thou mayest kill</n> וְאָכַלְתָּ֣ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and eat</n> בָשָׂ֗ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>flesh</n> כְּבִרְכַּ֨ת <sup>1293 </sup> <n>according to the blessing</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נָֽתַן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which he hath given</n> לְךָ֖ בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>whatever</n> שְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>in all thy gates</n> הַטָּמֵ֤א <sup>2931 </sup> <n>thee the unclean</n> וְהַטָּהוֹר֙ <sup>2889 </sup> <n>and the clean</n> יֹאכְלֶ֔נּוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>may eat</n> כַּצְּבִ֖י <sup>6643 </sup> <n>thereof as of the roebuck</n> וְכָאַיָּֽל׃ <sup>354 </sup> <n>and as of the hart</n>
16: רַ֥ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> הַדָּ֖ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>the blood</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>Only ye shall not eat</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָאָ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>it upon the earth</n> תִּשְׁפְּכֶ֖נּוּ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>ye shall pour</n> כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>as water</n>
17: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> תוּכַ֞ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>Thou mayest</n> לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>not eat</n> בִּשְׁעָרֶ֗יךָ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>within thy gates</n> מַעְשַׂ֤ר <sup>4643 </sup> <n>the tithe</n> דְּגָֽנְךָ֙ <sup>1715 </sup> <n>of thy corn</n> וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>or of thy wine</n> וְיִצְהָרֶ֔ךָ <sup>3323 </sup> <n>or of thy oil</n> וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <sup>1062 </sup> <n>or the firstlings</n> בְּקָרְךָ֖ <sup>1241 </sup> <n>of thy herds</n> וְצֹאנֶ֑ךָ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>or of thy flock</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> נְדָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>nor any of thy vows</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תִּדֹּ֔ר <sup>5087 </sup> <n>which thou vowest</n> וְנִדְבֹתֶ֖יךָ <sup>5071 </sup> <n>nor thy freewill offerings</n> וּתְרוּמַ֥ת <sup>8641 </sup> <n>or heave offering</n> יָדֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thine hand</n>

29: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יַכְרִית֩ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>shall cut off</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>When the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>the nations</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אַתָּ֥ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בָא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>thee whither thou goest</n> שָׁ֛מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in</n> לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n> אוֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from before</n> וְיָרַשְׁתָּ֣ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>them and thou succeedest</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>them and dwellest</n> בְּאַרְצָֽם׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in their land</n>
30: הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Take heed</n> לְךָ֗ פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>you are not</n> תִּנָּקֵשׁ֙ <sup>5367 </sup> <n>to thyself that thou be not snared</n> אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>310 </sup> <n>by following</n> אַחֲרֵ֖י <sup>310 </sup> <n>them after</n> הִשָּׁמְדָ֣ם <sup>8045 </sup> <n>that they be destroyed</n> מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from before</n> וּפֶן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּדְרֹ֨שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>thee and that thou enquire</n> לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶ֜ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>not after their gods</n> לֵאמֹ֨ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אֵיכָ֨ה <sup>349 </sup> <n>how</n> יַעַבְד֜וּ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>serve</n> הַגּוֹיִ֤ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>How did these nations</n> הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their gods</n> וְאֶעֱשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>may do</n> כֵּ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>likewise</n> אָֽנִי׃ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n>
31: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not do</n> כֵ֔ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>thus</n> לַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>so unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> תּוֹעֲבַ֨ת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>for every abomination</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>to the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שָׂנֵ֗א <sup>8130 </sup> <n>which he hateth</n> עָשׂוּ֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>have they done</n> לֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto their gods</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גַ֤ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>even</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for even their sons</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and their daughters</n> יִשְׂרְפ֥וּ <sup>8313 </sup> <n>they have burnt</n> בָאֵ֖שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>in the fire</n> לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>to their gods</n>
32: אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>What</n> הַדָּבָ֗ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>What thing</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אָנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוֶּ֣ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>soever I command</n> אֶתְכֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> אֹת֥וֹ <sup>853 </sup> תִשְׁמְר֖וּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>you observe</n> לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to do</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>to nor</n> תֹסֵ֣ף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>it thou shalt not add</n> עָלָ֔יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תִגְרַ֖ע <sup>1639 </sup> <n>thereto nor diminish</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> פ
